name: Spring Challenge (Madison)
description:
This charity fitness challenge is open to teams from companies that are based in the Madison, WI and surrounding area.

Participating Teams: 20
Entry Fee: $200
Grand Prize: $1000 Donation

name: Kilter Rewards Summer Cause Challenge
description:
Join us for the Kilter Rewards Summer Cause Challenge!

Start Date: June 15, 2019
End Date: July 31, 2019
Team Sizes: 15-50
Entry Fee: $400
($200 goes to donation prize pool)

$2800 Donation Prize Pool
GRAND PRIZE: $1400

name: Kilter Rewards Fall Cause Challenge
description:
Enter a team of 20 employees in the Kilter Rewards Fall Cause Challenge to win one of five donation prizes for the charity of their choice! How do they win? The team must finish with one of the five top wellness scores!

Start Date: September 16, 2019
End Date: October 15, 2019
Team Size Limit: 20 Participants
Team Entry Fee: $500 ($250 goes to donation prize pool!)

GRAND PRIZE: 50% of Donation Prize Pool
2nd Place: 25% of Donation Prize Pool
3rd Place: 12.5% of Donation Prize Pool
4th Place: 7.5% of Donation Prize Pool
5th Place: 5% of Donation Prize Pool

1/50 Teams Registered
